title: 某強國兩位 snooker 職業球手打假波被重罰禁賽 10年！

replies.msg:
https://www.eurosport.com/snooker/snooker-news-yu-delu-and-cao-yupeng-hit-with-heavy-bans-for-match-fixing_sto7033431/story.shtml

Yu Delu has been banned for 10 years and nine months with Chinese compatriot Cao Yupeng hit with a six-year ban after the pair pleaded guilty in a major match-fixing probe.

Yu Delu's five fixed matches
Indian Open qualifiers: beat Martin McCrudden 4-3 on 12 February 2015
Paul Hunter Classic: lost 4-1 to Dominic Dale in Germany on 29 August 2015
Welsh Open: beat Ian Glover 4-3 on 15 February 2016
European Masters qualifiers: lost 4-1 to Michael Georgiou on 4 August 2017
Shanghai Masters: lost 5-3 to Kurt Maflin on 15 November 2017

Cao Yupeng's three fixed matches
Welsh Open: lost 4-1 to v Ali Carter on 15 January 2016
Indian Open qualifiers: lost 4-0 to Stuart Bingham on 30 June 2016
UK Championship: lost 6-1 to Stephen Maguire on 24 November 2016
